name: Spices
description: Spices are a powerful tool in cocktail crafting, adding layers of warmth, depth, and aromatic complexity beyond just sweetness or acidity. From common baking spices like cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves, which evoke comforting, seasonal flavors, to more exotic notes like cardamom, star anise, or even chili for a subtle kick, spices can fundamentally transform a drink's character. They can be introduced through infusions (steeping spices directly in spirits), in homemade syrups, as concentrated bitters, or simply as a fragrant garnish, allowing mixologists to fine-tune a cocktail's profile, create intriguing contrasts, and add a memorable sensory experience.
